SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar, c.create_time as contactTime FROM contact c LEFT JOIN user u ON (c.user_id = u.id OR c.friend_id = u.id) WHERE (c.user_id = #{userId} OR c.friend_id = #{userId}) AND c.status = #{status} AND u.id != #{userId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN user_id = #{userId} THEN friend_id WHEN friend_id = #{userId} THEN user_id END as contact_user_id FROM contact WHERE (user_id = #{userId} OR friend_id = #{userId}) AND status = #{status}

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.avatar, c.create_time as contactTime, c.remarks FROM contact c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.friend_id = #{userId} AND c.status = 0 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM contact WHERE status = 0 AND expire_at IS NOT NULL AND expire_at < #{expireTime} ORDER BY expire_at ASC
